cyclone.name: BERYL
cyclone.current_location: about 1140 miles ESE of the Lesser Antilles
cyclone.trajectory: Accelerating west-northwest toward the Lesser Antilles with gradual weakening expected before reaching the islands

weather_observation.watch_coast: None posted – interests in the Lesser Antilles advised to monitor
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Lesser Antilles from Guadeloupe southward to Barbados, including Dominica and Martinique
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (3%) of tropical-storm-force winds; gusts could reach 30–35 mph on Monday if outer bands clip the island
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected due to distant passage and small storm size
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rain bands may bring 1–2 inches of rain late Sunday night into Monday
weather_observation.other_hazards: Rough seas and rip currents beginning late weekend
